snippet.title: Rise Up! Game Trailer 2 0 - Our Journey Begins
snippet.description:
Rise Up!, a space action/adventure game, challenging your strategic abilities and skills.

You play as Ian, the civilian Environmental Director of the space station Alma Con. The station is reeling from a devastating collision with a 1960's era booster. You are one of the few remaining survivors. With limited resources and an admiral hell-bent on sabotaging your efforts, you must make critical decisions in the race to rebuild Space Station Alma Con.

Use Snowball to stop Alma Con from breaking apart. 
Ride Snowball, your trusty drone, to stop orbiting space debris from destroying your home. Create a recycling technology to repurpose the mangled bits of robots, burnt debris, and equipment to rebuild Alma Con. 
Fly you ship into deep space to collect junked and abandoned space craft. 
Collect achievement badges and play bonus levels as you progress through the game. 

https://www.fricknfrackgames.com
Joining our Discord server: https://discord.gg/Qkhq25jN
Leaving feedback and suggestions on what you think we should do next in the development of Rise Up!

Follow the progress of Rise Up! on our social media and send us your feedback.

Twitter:https: //twitter.com/FricknfrackL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fricknfrack3/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fricknfrack-games/
Discord: https://discord.gg/Qkhq25jN
Website: https://www.fricknfrackgames.com

#indiedev #indiegamedev #indiegame
